prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: As of 2019, Springfield had a population of 10,566, making it the sixth most populous city in the state of Illinois.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Title should be concise and clear
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Springfield: Illinois' Sixth Most Populous City
